org.mixare

Class DataView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mixare.DataView

  • public class DataView
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is able to update the markers and the radar. It also handles some user events
    Author:
    daniele

      • getIsLauncherStarted

        public boolean getIsLauncherStarted()
        Return the state of available data, is their datasources (launched). By default it's true, since Mixare comes with built in datasources
        Returns:
        boolean true if data has been requested, false otherwise
